title: Promote current draft build to live (production) canister

requirements.text: Promote the currently deployed draft build (Draft Version 137) to the live (production) canister without introducing additional code or schema changes.
acceptanceCriteria: The live (production) canister is updated to match Draft Version 137.
No frontend or backend code changes are introduced as part of the promotion.
No backend schema/state migration is performed as part of the promotion.

requirements.text: Run a post-promotion smoke check on the live (production) deployment covering: initial app load, Internet Identity login/logout, actor initialization (no initialization trap), profile gating (profile setup vs dashboard), and verifying that submission proficiency tooltips render without errors.
acceptanceCriteria: The app loads on production with no uncaught console errors.
Users can log in via Internet Identity and reach the dashboard if a profile exists.
If a profile does not exist, the user is routed to profile setup without flicker loops.
Submission proficiency tooltips render (including Purple belt) and do not crash the UI.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend.immutablePaths (read-only components/hooks).
Respect the single-actor backend architecture (all Motoko logic remains in backend/main.mo).
Do not add new features or UI changes; this request is a promotion-only action.
nonGoals: Changing tooltip copy or tooltip styling.
Any new backend endpoints, data model changes, or migrations.
Any new images or asset generation.
